instructions:
In small bowl, combine sugar, pecans, butter and cinnamon; set aside.
Place waffles on a baking sheet that has been sprayed with no-stick cooking spray. Top with drained blueberries. Sprinkle with streusel mixture.
Bake in a preheated 375 degrees F oven 20 minutes or until golden brown and bubbly. Serve with ice cream, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (7.4 ounce) package Richfood® Frozen Blueberry Waffles
1 (10 ounce) package Wild Harvest® Organic Frozen Blueberries, thawed and drained
title: Blueberry Waffle Streusel
